thread.title: U. H. Zaveri Standalone December 2024 Net Sales at Rs 15.51 crore, up 100.85% Y-o-Y
thread.title_full: U. H. Zaveri Standalone December 2024 Net Sales at Rs 15.51 crore, up 100.85% Y-o-Y

author: Abhishek Shingare
title: U. H. Zaveri Standalone December 2024 Net Sales at Rs 15.51 crore, up 100.85% Y-o-Y
text: Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for U. H. Zaveri are: Net Sales at Rs 15.51 crore in December 2024 up 100.85% from Rs. 7.72 crore in December 2023. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 0.02 crore in December 2024 down 94.82% from Rs. 0.34 crore in December 2023. EBITDA stands at Rs. 0.03 crore in December 2024 down 92.5% from Rs. 0.40 crore in December 2023. U. H. Zaveri EPS has decreased to Rs. 0.02 in December 2024 from Rs. 0.34 in December 2023. U. H. Zaveri shares closed at 13.65 on January 09, 2025 (BSE) and has given -36.21% returns over the last 6 months and -68.34% over the last 12 months. U. H. Zaveri Standalone Quarterly Results in Rs. Cr.
